mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookshelf(book_status_num, book_status, mem_num, isbn) VALUES(bookshelf_SEQ.nextval, #{book_status}, #{mem_num}, #{isbn})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bookshelf WHERE isbn=#{isbn} AND mem_num=#{mem_num} AND bookshelf.book_status = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appraisal(appraisal_num, star, book_comment, start_date, end_date, co_prv, book_status_num) VALUES(appraisal_SEQ.nextval, #{star}, #{book_comment}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{co_prv}, #{book_status_num})
mapper.select: SELECT appraisal.appraisal_num, appraisal.star, appraisal.book_comment, appraisal.start_date, appraisal.end_date, appraisal.book_status_num, member.mem_id, member.mem_pic, member.mem_pass FROM bookshelf INNER JOIN appraisal ON bookshelf.book_status_num = appraisal.book_status_num INNER JOIN member ON bookshelf.mem_num = member.mem_num WHERE bookshelf.isbn=#{isbn} AND appraisal.co_prv='공개'
SELECT COUNT(appraisal.book_comment) FROM bookshelf INNER JOIN appraisal ON bookshelf.book_status_num = appraisal.book_status_num WHERE bookshelf.isbn=#{isbn} AND appraisal.co_prv='공개'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookshelf WHERE book_status_num= (SELECT book_status_num FROM appraisal WHERE appraisal_num=#{appraisal_num})
